dcterms:creator: Bochen Li
Xinzhao Liu
Karthik Dinesh
Zhiyao Duan
Gaurav Sharma
dcterms:description: The University of Rochester Multi-Modal Music Performance Dataset consists of multi-instrument recordings of musical pieces where each instrument is recorded on an individual track.
dcterms:title: University of Rochester Multi-Modal Music Performance Dataset (URMP)

dcterms:description: The clean dataset consists of the original URMP recordings, without any added noise.
dcterms:title: Clean Dataset (derived from URMP)

dcterms:description: The shuffle dataset is generated by adding a shuffled version of the clean dataset to itself, creating a situation where signal and noise frequencies overlapped.
dcterms:title: Shuffle Dataset (derived from URMP)

dcterms:description: The outliers dataset is generated by randomly scaling each of the samples in the clean dataset, ensuring the models were trained and evaluated on noise which was a function of, or correlated with, the signal.
dcterms:title: Outliers Dataset (derived from URMP)
